items.sentence: Tom and Mary agreed to leave the party before midnight.
Tom and Mary are living in the same apartment building.
Tom and Mary are trying to get their marriage annulled.
Tom and Mary congratulated each other on their success.
It isn\'t much fun going mountain climbing by yourself.
Tom thinks he\'s being shadowed by a private detective.
Tom thought he probably shouldn\'t go there by himself.
This river is shallow enough to wade to the other side.
Someone stabbed Tom with an ice pick, but he\'s OK now.
I\'m afraid I cannot make myself understood in English.
I\'m always harder on myself than I am on other people.
I\'m going to get myself some coffee. Do you want some?
I\'m happy that you were able to find a job so quickly.
Boston is the only place where I\'ve ever felt at home.
I felt so sleepy that I could hardly keep my eyes open.
I found a good place to buy fruit a couple of days ago.
I\'m going to sign up for a French class next semester.
I didn\'t want to catch a cold, so I didn\'t go skiing.
Do you still think Tom and Mary shouldn\'t get married?
If you don\'t want to do it for Tom, then do it for me.
